channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Triumphal Arch Is An Important Rebellion Against Postmodern Thought
item.description: The greatness of neoclassical art and architecture lies not merely in historical memory but in truth. And that's why modernists hate it.

item.title: Judge: Federal agents in Oregon must limit tear gas at protests outside Portland ICE building
item.description: A judge in Oregon on Tuesday temporarily restricted federal officers from using tear gas at protests at the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement b...

item.title: Valley Forge Park Preserves A Crucible Of The American Revolution
item.description: Valley Forge is a testament to the dedication of the thousands who sacrificed themselves for liberty, their homeland, and their posterity.

item.title: DHS drawdown begins in Minnesota; 700 officers to leave immediately
item.description: White House border czar Tom Homan declared a victory of sorts in Minneapolis, saying the feds are now getting "unprecedented cooperation" from local c...

item.title: Judge set to hear arguments as court gives Trump another shot at nixing hush money conviction
item.description: A federal judge is set to hear arguments Wednesday after an appeals court directed him to take a fresh look at President Trump's bid to erase his hush...

item.title: The ‘Stolen Land’ Charge Ignores Most of Human History
item.description: If we are guilty of ‘stealing land,’ so is nearly everyone else in history, including Native Americans.

item.title: Melania Outfoxes the Haters
item.description: The FLOTUS documentary doubles as news and redemption.

item.title: Why Are So Many Nurses Wishing Harm To Their Political Opponents?
item.description: Too many Americans cleave to the idea that if someone works in caregiving, they must be trustworthy.

item.title: New Mexico And Utah Target ‘Homewrecker’ Laws That Protect Cheaters’ Spouses And Kids
item.description: If the Utah legislation succeeds, which it’s on track to do, that will leave only four states with alienation of affection laws on the books.

item.title: The University of Notre Dame’s Alarming Pro-Abortion Appointment
item.description: Susan Ostermann’s elevation would mark the first time the school has had a leader known for publicly and habitually repudiating a core component of it...

item.title: Federal Reserve governor Stephen Miran steps down from White House post
item.description: Federal Reserve governor Stephen Miran has stepped down from his position as chair of the White House's Council of Economic Advisers, ending a controv...

item.title: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran resigns from White House's Council of Economic Advisers
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is resigning from his White House job as chair of the Council of Economic Advisers, fulfilling a pledge he made...

item.title: Congress Could Fix The Entitlement Fraud Problem Overnight But Won’t
item.description: The current major problems of federal budget pressures and health care affordability for all consumers require action.

item.title: Medical Malpractice Comes Home to Roost in Detransitioner Verdict
item.description: Young people who were victimized by ideology masquerading as medicine are beginning to get justice in our courts.

item.title: Beware the Biden Nostalgia
item.description: The caricature that Joe Biden’s hapless image-makers engineered for the former president is about to make a comeback.
